--------------------------- ----------------------------

Will Carson(Bryan O&#039;Halloran) is a down-and-out clown struggling to remain
financially afloat. Will decides to try being a ?clown stripper? to provide some
laughs at bachelor parties. The joke being instead of a regular stripper, you get
this male clown stripper and the attendants get a good laugh at the expense of the
man of honor.

His first job is nothing to laugh at when he is brutally attacked by a sadistic
father and his two moronic sons. Because of the shame and disgust one would normally
feel being dressed as a stripper, Will is reluctant to go to the police.

While he?s limping along, he happens to save a little girl from being held hostage by
her gun-toting, soon-to-be divorced father. Now he?s a media darling with his own
successful kids? show, but a phone call starts events that can only end in tragedy.

--------------------------- ----------------------------

Everybody loves a clown... some more than others.

Enjoy the movie!
